item.description:
Meet: 1:45 p.m. at Daly Memorial Rink, 4 Nonantum Road, Newton, MA, 02135.

Trip's Leader: Heather P, hplatt@mosiacofmass.org

EVENT: Come join us for a fun afternoon and some exercise as we go ice-skating at the indoor Daly Memorial Rink.  We will be skating for about an hour and a half, and then we’ll plan to go out for a cup of coffee and a snack afterwards.    For more information: Visit: http://www.newtoncountryday.org/RelId/606464/ISvars/default/Daly_Rink.htm or call:
617.527.1741.

RSVP:  Required by March 30th to Heather, the TC.

COST:  Admission is $5 and skate rentals are available. There is a $5 charge for Meetups participants and guests which can be credited to a full Mosaic membership of $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to Heather and get more details and make the arrangements for meeting

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: ICE SKATING FUN in NEWTON
